stories.text:
In regard but not related to recent outages of the AWS infra, many people tell how awful their experience with AWS-specific tooling is. E.g., a lot of comments say that CloudFormation is a nightmare to work with, and when it comes to CFN templates - it's just a no go ("use terraform instead"). Maybe share your experience and suggest mitigations, if such exist?

What troubles you most?
stories.title: Ask HN: What do you lack in AWS tooling?

stories.text:
I never had a mentor during my years in the industry. So I am wondering is it really necessary to have a mentor for yourself as a developer/engineer?

How much is it going to affect one's career in the absence of a mentor?
stories.title: Ask HN: How important is it to have a mentor?
